bdi4jade.extension.planselection.utilitybased

Class AndPlanGoalDependency

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.extension.planselection.utilitybased.PlanGoalDependency
      • bdi4jade.extension.planselection.utilitybased.AndPlanGoalDependency

  • public class AndPlanGoalDependency
extends PlanGoalDependency
    This class represents an AND dependency between a plan and a set of goals. It means that this plan needs that all goals that it depends on must be achieved so that the plan can be completed.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
